name: SCREAM - Sprint Car Racing Evolved - Action on Mud
name_original: SCREAM - Sprint Car Racing Evolved - Action on Mud
description:
SCREAM - Sprint Car Racing Evolved - Action on Mud

https://mahda.itch.io/scream

Sprint Car Racing in your Browser!
You don't even have to install anything!
(although it is about 200MB of data, sorry haven't optimised yet)

I'll be updating the game constantly but it's at a stage that is playable, so I've decided to release it for the public to hopefully enjoy absolutely free!

Leave a Like or a comment if you enjoy it!

if you want to shout me a coffee for my efforts you can donate to:

https://paypal.me/paychrisgreene?country.x=AU&locale.x=en_AU

Cheers Everyone!
